title: Nico Tortorella calls Instagram 'a bish' for deleting racy underwear snap
text:
Nico Tortorella branded Instagram 'a bish' for deleting a smoldering underwear snapshot they posted Wednesday.

The 31-year-old Younger star posed in the initial photo wearing nothing but a clinging pair of boxer briefs that left very little to the imagination.

When Instagram deleted the photo for violating Community Guidelines related to 'nudity or sexual activity,' Nico captioned the notification: '@instagram you's a bish'.

Little to the imagination: Nico Tortorella branded Instagram 'a bish' for deleting a smoldering underwear snapshot they posted Wednesday

Nico, who has identified as gender fluid and used they/them pronouns, rose to fame while starring on the TV Land program Younger.

Created by Darren Star of Sex And The City fame, the show is led by Broadway veteran Sutton Foster and also features Lizzie McGuire star Hilary Duff.

The show concluded its sixth and latest season on TV Land last month but over the summer was renewed for a seventh.

Star of the small screen: Nico, who has identified as gender fluid and used they/them pronouns, rose to fame while starring on the TV Land program Younger

Beloved: Nico is bisexual and in a polyamorous marriage with one Bethany Meyers (pictured), whom he tied the knot with last year after a 12-year relationship

Nico is bisexual and in a polyamorous marriage with one Bethany Meyers, whom he tied the knot with last year after a 12-year relationship.

They told People of their marriage last year: 'We still don't live together.'

Said Nico: 'We see each other on a weekly basis. We’re FaceTiming all day, everyday.'

Literary venture: Last month, Nico released a memoir called Space Between: Explorations Of Love, Sex, And Fluidity after putting out the poetry collection All Of It Is You in 2018

Last month, Nico released a memoir called Space Between: Explorations Of Love, Sex, And Fluidity after putting out the poetry collection All Of It Is You in 2018.

Their upcoming acting projects include a currently untitled spin-off of the smash hit AMC zombie program The Walking Dead.

Also starring Aliyah Royale and Annet Mahendru, the new TV show is slated to begin airing episodes sometime next year according to IMDb.
description: Nico Tortorella branded Instagram 'a bish' for deleting a smoldering underwear snapshot they posted Wednesday.
